suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using more vibrant and distinct colors for the background to make the characters stand out more. Additionally, using darker outlines for the characters and objects can help them pop against the background. The Chinese characters could also benefit from bolder colors or outlines to enhance their visibility and impact. Experimenting with complementary color schemes can further enhance the overall visual appeal and make the contrast more pronounced.
